decision_conditions: It is not clear from the submitted information whether the proposed installation of the solar panels falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 14, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended), in terms of Paragraph A.1 (a) and A.1 (b).
